LITESOPH-Input-WindowÔÉÅ

It is task manager used to make inputs in three parts: inputs for Ground State, inputs for chosen engine and inputs for SCF convergence of the chosen engine.

Save Input : Save the input and enable the Submit Local and Submit Network.
